about_the_game:
When the world is falling apart, hope remains only for those who dare to stand against the chaos. In Elemental Towers VR, you must harness the power of the four elements and build legendary magical towers to restore balance to the shattered world of Elemar. Prepare for thrilling puzzles, strategic battles against dragons, and competitions in mastering elemental magic!

  • Story Mode
    Immerse yourself in the ancient world of Elemar, uncover its secrets, and restore the ruined elemental towers. Gradually unlock new mechanics, abilities, and game modes!

  • Innovative VR Gameplay
    Build your tower using pentomino blocks, forming closed rings to ascend higher.

  • Epic Dragon Battles
    Each biome is home to unique elemental dragons that attack your tower, requiring a tactical approach to defeat them.

  • Magical Abilities
    Harness elemental powers, break blocks, activate bonuses, and combine runes to protect your tower.

  • Diverse Biomes
    Travel through swampy lands, frozen mountains, sky islands, and rivers of lava as you work to restore balance to the world.

  • Rune Combination Strategy
    The right mix of elemental runes grants powerful bonuses, but the wrong combinations can trigger catastrophic effects.

  • Escalating Elemental Chaos
    Nature rises against you! Water floods, lava surges, storm clouds rage, and the swamp pulls you under. The longer you play, the greater the threat grows! Act quickly, or the elements will consume both you and your tower.

  • Online Leaderboards
    Prove you’re the best by competing with players worldwide for high scores and fastest completion times!

  • Upcoming Multiplayer Modes
    A duel mode is planned for the future, where players will battle each other in real-time!

Additional Modes

At the start of the game, two additional modes will be available. Unlike the Dragon Mode, these modes allow players to focus on a single objective. They help players master the mechanics and develop a strategy without the distraction of defending the tower or fending off enemies.

Building Mode – In this mode, players face a time-based challenge where they must construct a tower without the ability to use magic to destroy blocks. Every decision becomes critically important, and careful planning is the key to success.

Combination Mode – Here, players don’t have to worry about sealing the elemental tower rings, but the threat of flooding remains. To survive as long as possible, they must find and activate special rune combinations to prevent the rising danger from consuming both them and the tower.

short_description: Immerse yourself in a world of elemental magic and ancient mysteries! The game combines puzzle-solving, strategy, and dynamic battles to create a unique VR experience. Use magic, combine elemental runes, break blocks, and repel enemy attacks to restore elemental balance.
supported_languages: English, Spanish - Spain, Russian, French, Italian, German
